#summary How to report issue / defect.

= Who =

Anyone interested in our benchmark. We extremely appreciate all comments and questions.


= How =

If you have a Gmail account. Go to the [https://code.google.com/p/benchmarkcrowd/issues/list] Issues menu and open a new issue.

Otherwise, please report the issue to [lamtran3101@gmail.com lamtran3101@gmail.com] with the following template:

especially helpful for us)
